questList.questDescription: Navigate through the treacherous Shadowed Canyon and either eliminate or ally with the haunting entities that dwell within.
Unite the restless spirits of the Whispering Shadows in Shadowed Canyon to bring peace to the accursed land.
Defeat the Sinister Echo of the Forgotten in Shadowed Canyon and claim the amulet of alliance for your cause.
Succeed in Infernal Wasteland by forming alliances with some and annihilating others amongst the Scorching Legion.
Unite the demonical creatures in Infernal Wasteland for a chance to gain the amulet of healing.
Bring an end to the Infernal Hades Guard of the Scorched Plains in Infernal Wasteland to secure the amulet of alliance.
Confront and defeat the Tenebrous Lord of Cursed Souls in the Fiendish Crypt to emerge victorious and timeless.
Seek unity among the Infernal Keepers in the depths of the Fiendish Crypt and claim the amulet of healing for renewed strength.
Defy the Inferno Crawlers of the Molten Depths in the Fiendish Crypt and seize the amulet of alliance in defiance.
